chaos.name: Chaos Mod
chaos.desc:
By drakeerv

Pure chaos. Use at your own risk.

gui.name: Gui Mod
gui.desc:
By Awesomeguy

Customize your HUD! Move around elements, right click to edit them, pause the game to enable/disable and add custom text nodes!

PRESS THE GREEN CHECKMARKS TO SAVE SETTING

hurricane.name: Hurricane Mod
hurricane.desc:
By Toadi

Creates random wind for you to suffer in.

levelselector.name: Level Selector Mod
levelselector.desc:
By drakeerv

Pick from all the levels and more!

randomlevel.name: Random Level Mod
randomlevel.desc:
By drakeerv

Use 'shift + y' to be taken to a random level.

savestate.name: Save State Mod
savestate.desc:
By skymen

'Shift + s': Create Checkpoint
'Shift + r': Return to Original Spawn
'Shift + n': Bypass to next level
'Shift + b': Bypass to previous level
'Shift + m': Move to end flag
'Shift + c': Move to coin

modapi.name: Mod API
modapi.desc: Open in devtools to use manipulate game mechanics.

darkmode.name: Dark Mode
darkmode.desc: Ease your eyes with a dark theme.

tas.name: TAS Tools
tas.desc:
By skymen

Perfect speedruns with frame advance, savestates, and more!

Join the Discord for more info & help.
